thread.title: Saif Ali Khan confirms daughter Sara to be launched by Karan Johar | Hindi Movie News - Times of India
thread.title_full: Saif Ali Khan confirms daughter Sara to be launched by Karan Johar | Hindi Movie News - Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Saif Ali Khan confirms daughter Sara to be launched by Karan Johar | Hindi Movie News - Times of India

organizations.name: hindi movie news - times of india

text:
There have been numerous rumours surrounding the launch of Saif Ali Khan 's daughter Sara Ali Khan in Bollywood. While some reports indicated that the young star kid would be launched opposite Hrithik Roshan, those turned out to be baseless stories. Now, it appears that daddy Saif just let the cat out of the bag! According to media reports, the proud papa, in an interview with a portal, revealed that good friend Karan Johar will take the aspiring star under his wing and give her the big Bollywood break she has been waiting for. 

Stating that the "intelligent and passionate" filmmaker is "brilliant" with newcomers, Saif admitted that he was pleased that Sara getting her break with him. The actor also said that his daughter often discusses whatever she wants with him, and that although he gives her his advice, she is the one who takes the final call. 

If rumours doing the rounds are true, then Sara is likely to feature in Karan's 'Student Of The Year 2' opposite Tiger Shroff.
